Text: thanks for giving me something to do at work

Thank you. Nice collection. although a little overwhelming to say the least. some folders contain only one comic consisting of two to three pages. Makes looking through it all into a bit of a hassle. 

All in all a pretty decent collection, especially if you're willing to put a little time and effort into looking around in it. I didn't have patience though.
thank you soooo muuuchhh BZUCINO for all the contribution. A to Z now complete!!!
